original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1251)@</color>消耗自身 <color=#ccffcc>25%</color> 體力以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(506)@ x 2</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>對前後範圍內敵方造成物理傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1251)@</color> Consume oneself <color=#ccffcc>25%</color> Physical strength to <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(506)@ x 2</color> <color=#80cc00>War</color> inflicts physical damage to the enemy in the front and back range.
